mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company(user_Id, company_Name, company_Email, company_Phone,tech, address, ceo_Name, created_At) VALUE(#{userId}, #{companyName}, #{companyEmail}, #{companyPhone}, #{tech}, #{address}, #{ceoName}, now())
mapper.update: Update company SET company_name = #{companyName}, company_email = #{companyEmail}, company_phone = #{companyPhone}, tech = #{tech}, address = #{address}, ceoName = #{ceoName} WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(recommend.subject_id) as recommend_count , FIRST.* FROM (SELECT n.*, c.user_id user_id, c.company_name company_name, c.address address FROM (select * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_id desc) n INNER JOIN company c ON n.company_id = c.company_id WHERE is_closed =0 GROUP BY (user_id) ) FIRST LEFT OUTER JOIN recommend ON recommend.subject_id = FIRST.user_id GROUP BY (notice_id) ORDER BY Count(recommend.subject_id) desc

SELECT COUNT(recommend.subject_id) as recommend_count , FIRST.* FROM (SELECT n.*, c.user_id user_id, c.company_name company_name, c.address address FROM (select * FROM notice where notice_id = #{noticeId}) n INNER JOIN company c ON n.company_id = c.company_id WHERE is_closed =0 GROUP BY (user_id) ) FIRST LEFT OUTER JOIN recommend ON recommend.subject_id = FIRST.user_id ORDER BY subject_id desc

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.password, c.company_name, c.ceo_name, c.address, c.company_phone, substr(company_email,1, instr(company_email,'@')-1) AS company_email, c.tech FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET ceo_name = #{ceoName}, address = #{address}, company_phone=#{companyPhone}, company_email =#{companyEmail}, tech=#{tech} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from company c inner join user u on c.user_Id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
